about.header: 👋 I am Álvaro Molina, product designer
about.intro: My goal is to create solutions that contribute to improving the environment around us, try to make people's lives more comfortable, and have a lot of fun during the process.
about.description: I have been working as a product designer at Genially for over 2 years, although for the past 9 years I have worked on UI design, design systems, animation, web design, and graphic design projects. In addition, during 5 of these years, I worked on audiovisual projects as an audiovisual technician, director of photography, and camera operator.

current.position: Product Designer at Genially ↗
current.description: Focused on facilitating the creation of distinctive communication experiences in educational, academic, and professional fields through the use of effects, interactivity, and animation, proposing solutions for user experience and interface by carrying out a complete design process, getting involved from identifying opportunities to evaluating solutions after implementation.

previous.position: UI & Design System Designer at Genially ↗
previous.description: Creating the foundations of the design system, documenting, designing key components, and defining basic design patterns, seeking maximum scalability with a focus on implementation feasibility, as there was no design system before. I also participated in designing the website by building a modular system that allowed the content team to create pages through a custom content manager. Additionally, I was involved in redesigning different parts of the app's UI.
